query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS esg_metrics_history (
    id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    projectId INT NOT NULL,
    metricType ENUM('energy_efficiency', 'water_conservation', 'waste_management', 'carbon_emissions') NOT NULL,
    metricDate TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    score DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    grade VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL,
    gradeDescriptor VARCHAR(50),
    rawValue DECIMAL(15,4),
    unit VARCHAR(50),
    previousScore DECIMAL(5,2),
    trendPercent DECIMAL(5,2),
    trendDirection ENUM('up', 'down', 'stable'),
    createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    INDEX idx_project_metric_date (projectId, metricType, metricDate)
);

    id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    projectId INT NOT NULL,
    metricType ENUM('energy_efficiency', 'water_conservation', 'waste_management', 'carbon_emissions') NOT NULL,
    metricDate TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    score DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    grade VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL,
    gradeDescriptor VARCHAR(50),
    rawValue DECIMAL(15,4),
    unit VARCHAR(50),
    previousScore DECIMAL(5,2),
    trendPercent DECIMAL(5,2),
    trendDirection ENUM('up', 'down', 'stable'),
    createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    INDEX idx_project_metric_date (projectId, metricType, metricDate)
);
